title: SLA Reporting - Analyze Ticket Trends
description: An account manager analyzes ticket trends for a client to identify recurring problems.

tasks.description: Export all tickets for a client for the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager has a CSV file of all recent tickets.

tasks.description: Categorize and analyze the data to identify the most common ticket types.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis reveals that 'password reset' tickets are the most frequent category, indicating a potential for user training or a self-service solution.

tasks.description: Propose implementing a self-service password reset (SSPR) solution to the client to reduce ticket volume and improve user experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: A data-driven recommendation is made to the client.
